SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Blackjack
Blackjack extends Games, simulating blackjack.
Card
Card represents a single playing card from a standard deck, including suit, rank, and value
Casino
The Casino class manages the casino game operations including player management and game selection.
Deck
Deck is the container for Cards.
Game
 
Games
Abstract class that represents a game.
Gui
 
Main
 
Player
Represents a player in a game.
Roulette
Roulette extends Games, simulating a roulette game.
RouletteBets
A utility class containing static methods to validate and calculate roulette bets.
RouletteNum
RouletteNum represents a single number on a roulette table, including its numeric value, color, row, and column placement.
RouletteTable
RouletteTable simulates the layout and functionality of a roulette table.
RouletteTable.BetType
Enum of the types of bets available on a roulette table with their payout multipliers and descriptions.
Slots
Slots extends Games, simulating a slot machine game It manages the spinning reels and calculates payouts based on the game outcomes
